name: Familia Boccini
desc: La família Boccini és una màfia. No ho dic jo, ho diu tothom a Barcelona. Tenen controlat tot el negoci tèxtil i no tenen competència, un monopoli en tota regla. No vol dir que siguin mala gent, tot el contrari; han donat feina a més de deu mil persones i financen projectes socials per als barcelonins. Alguns poden dir que és per a guanyar-se la confiança de la Generalitat, però els parcs i les biblioteques que han finançat allà hi són, serving the community.
descENG: The Boccini family is a mafia. I'm not saying it, everyone in Barcelona knows it. They control the entire textile business and have no competition, a full-fledged monopoly. It doesn't mean they are bad people, quite the opposite; they have employed more than ten thousand people and finance social projects for the people of Barcelona. Some may say it is to gain the trust of the local government, but the parks and libraries they have financed are all there, at the service of the people.
